attributes.action: Make the penalty for Causing Death By Dangerous Driving the same as that for Manslaughter.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The current system of handing out a maximum 10 years jail term for causing death by dangerous driving is wrong. If you hit someone with your car, driving dangerously and they die as a result then you have technically commited Manslaughter and should be sentanced as such.
